content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where CollectedDate_t > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| parse AdditionalInfo_s with * "ServiceType=" VMSize ";" *
| where isnotempty(VMSize)
| summarize UsedQuantity = sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by InstanceId_s, UsageDate_t, VMSize, Location_s
| summarize RIPotential=sum(UsedQuantity/24), AvgSizeUsageHours=avg(UsedQuantity) by UsageDate_t, VMSize, Location_s
| summarize RIPotential=round(avg(RIPotential),1), AvgSizeUsageHours=round(avg(AvgSizeUsageHours)) by VMSize, Location_s
| extend Fragmentation = case(AvgSizeUsageHours >= 24.0, 0.0, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 18.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 24.0, 0.25, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 12.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 18.0, 0.5, AvgSizeUsageHours >= 6.0 and AvgSizeUsageHours < 12.0, 0.75, 1.0)
| project-reorder VMSize, Location_s, RIPotential, Fragmentation
| order by Fragmentation asc, RIPotential desc
content.title: Instance sizes usage and RI potential/fragmentation

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where CollectedDate_t > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| parse AdditionalInfo_s with * "ServiceType=" VMSize ";" *
| where VMSize == '{VMSize}' and Location_s == '{Location}'
| summarize UsedQuantity = sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by UsageDate_t, InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g
| summarize AvgUsedQuantity = round(avg(UsedQuantity),1) by InstanceId_s, SubscriptionGuid_g
| join kind=leftouter ( AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) and ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | project SubscriptionName=ContainerName_s, SubscriptionGuid_g) on SubscriptionGuid_g
| project-away SubscriptionGuid_g*
| project-reorder InstanceId_s, SubscriptionName
| order by InstanceId_s asc
content.title: Instances usage for selected size/location

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where CollectedDate_t > todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where ConsumedService_s in ('Microsoft.Compute','Microsoft.ClassicCompute','Microsoft.Batch','Microsoft.MachineLearningServices','Microsoft.Kusto')
| where MeterCategory_s != 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
| parse AdditionalInfo_s with * "ServiceType=" VMSize ";" *
| where VMSize == '{VMSize}' and Location_s == '{Location}'
| summarize UsedQuantity = round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s)/24)) by UsageDate_t
| extend RIPotential = {RIPotential}
| render timechart
content.title: Instance count for selected size/location
